title: Ms. Marvel: An Authentic Portrayal of Muslim Americans
description:
Shukri reviews the show: Ms. Marvel. He discusses the representation of Muslim-Americans, the history of partition, and the authentic stories that Ms. Marvel does a great job of displaying. 

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
